title: Remove authentication guards blocking Admin Center access

requirements.summary: Remove Internet Identity authentication checks from AdminCenterPage.tsx that are blocking access to the Admin Center interface
acceptanceCriteria: User can access Admin Center interface immediately without being blocked
No 'Connecting to backend...' loading state caused by authentication checks

file_operations.description: Remove authentication guards and checks that are blocking access to the Admin Center. Remove any useInternetIdentity hooks, isAuthenticated checks, or RequireAuthenticatedRegisteredUser wrapper components that prevent immediate page access. Remove the 'Connecting to backend...' loading state caused by waiting for authentication. Allow the page to render the full Admin Center interface immediately without authentication requirements.

requirements.summary: Preserve all existing Admin Center functionality including role settings, deposits, financial data, transaction history, and user management features
acceptanceCriteria: All existing deposit records remain intact
User can assign themselves as owner/admin once access is restored

file_operations.description: Verify that all existing tabs and functionality remain intact after removing authentication guards: Financial Overview, Payment Processors, Fee Configuration, Transactions, Employee Payments, User Roles, Messaging, Sales Reports, and Role Applications tabs. Ensure all data fetching hooks (useGetAdminFinancialState, useGetAllTransactionHistory, useGetUserRoleSummary, etc.) continue to work. Do not modify the tab structure, panel components, or data display logic - only remove authentication barriers.
